name: CSS
def: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) allow you to change the look of web pages. It's usually the first thing you learn after HTML. CSS isn't a traditional language, but it is an incredibly useful one. This article provides a complete introduction to CSS along with a section on writing efficient code and dealing with the very big subject of colors. It also includes a complete list of CSS color names.
author: BINARYX#0210
